Motherload: (((abs(Open - High) / Open)*100 >= 0.333 or (abs(Open - Low) / Open)*100 >= 0.333) and (4*abs(Open-Close)<abs(High-Low))) and (100*((High-Low)/Open)>=0.555)
BullishMarubozu: Close[-2] > Open[-2] and High[-2]-Close[-2] <= 0.05*(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and Open[-2]-Low[-2] <= 0.05*(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > High[-2]
BearishMarubozu: Open[-2] > Close[-2] and High[-2]-Open[-2] <= 0.05*(Open[-2]-Close[-2]) and Close[-2]-Low[-2] <= 0.05*(Open[-2]-Close[-2]) and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Close[-1] < Low[-2]
Hammer: abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) <= (Min(Open[-2], Close[-2])-Low[-2])/1.5 and (High[-2]-Max(Open[-2], Close[-2])) <= 1.5*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > High[-2]
InvertedHammer: abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) <= (Min(Open[-2], Close[-2])-Low[-2])/1.5 and (High[-2]-Max(Open[-2], Close[-2])) >= 1.5*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > High[-2]
BullishEngulfing: Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Open[-1] <= Close[-2] and Close[-1] >= Open[-2]
BearishEngulfing: Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Open[-1] >= Close[-2] and Close[-1] <= Open[-2]
MorningStar: Close[-4] < Open[-4] and abs(Close[-3]-Open[-3]) < 0.5*abs(Open[-4]-Close[-4]) and Close[-3] < Close[-4] and Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Close[-2] > (Open[-4]+Close[-4])/2 and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > High[-2]
EveningStar: Close[-4] > Open[-4] and abs(Close[-3]-Open[-3]) < 0.5*abs(Open[-4]-Close[-4]) and Close[-3] > Close[-4] and Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-2] < (Open[-4]+Close[-4])/2 and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Close[-1] < Low[-2]
PiercingLine: Close[-3] < Open[-3] and Open[-2] < Close[-3] and Close[-2] > (Open[-3]+Close[-3])/2 and Close[-2] < Open[-3] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > High[-2]
DarkCloudCover: Close[-3] > Open[-3] and Open[-2] > Close[-3] and Close[-2] < (Open[-3]+Close[-3])/2 and Close[-2] > Open[-3] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Close[-1] < Low[-2]
RisingThreeMethods: Close[-5] > Open[-5] and Close[-5]-Open[-5] > 0.6*(High[-5]-Low[-5]) and all(Close[-4:-1].iloc[i]-Open[-4:-1].iloc[i] < 0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5]) and High[-4:-1].iloc[i] <= High[-5] and Low[-4:-1].iloc[i] >= Low[-5] for i in range(3)) and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > Close[-5]
AbandonedBaby: (Close[-3] < Open[-3] and abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) <= 0.1*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Close[-2] < Low[-3] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Open[-1] > High[-2]) or (Close[-3] > Open[-3] and abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) <= 0.1*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Low[-2] > High[-3] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Open[-1] < Low[-2])
ThreeInsideUp: Close[-3] < Open[-3] and Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Open[-2] >= Close[-3] and Close[-2] <= Open[-3] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > Open[-3]
ThreeInsideDown: Close[-3] > Open[-3] and Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Open[-2] <= Close[-3] and Close[-2] >= Open[-3] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Close[-1] < Open[-3]
BullishTasukiGap: Close[-3] > Open[-3] and Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Open[-2] >= Open[-3] and Open[-2] <= Close[-3] and Close[-2] > Open[-3] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > Close[-3]
BearishTasukiGap: Close[-3] < Open[-3] and Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Open[-2] <= Open[-3] and Open[-2] >= Close[-3] and Close[-2] < Open[-3] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Close[-1] < Close[-3]
MatHold: Close[-5] > Open[-5] and Close[-5]-Open[-5] > 0.6*(High[-5]-Low[-5]) and all(abs(Close[-4:-1].iloc[i]-Open[-4:-1].iloc[i]) < 0.5*(Close[-5]-Open[-5]) and Low[-4:-1].iloc[i] > Open[-5] for i in range(3)) and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1] > Close[-5]
Kicking: abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) > 0 and High[-2]-max(Open[-2],Close[-2]) <= 0.05*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and min(Open[-2],Close[-2])-Low[-2] <= 0.05*abs(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and abs(Close[-1]-Open[-1]) > 0 and High[-1]-max(Open[-1],Close[-1]) <= 0.05*abs(Close[-1]-Open[-1]) and min(Open[-1],Close[-1])-Low[-1] <= 0.05*abs(Close[-1]-Open[-1]) and ((Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Close[-1] < Open[-1]) or (Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-1] > Open[-1])) and ((Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Open[-1] > High[-2]) or (Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Open[-1] < Low[-2]))
ThreeWhiteSoldiers: Close[-3] > Open[-3] and Close[-3]-Open[-3] > 0.6*(High[-3]-Low[-3]) and Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Close[-2]-Open[-2] > 0.6*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Open[-2] >= Open[-3] and Open[-2] <= Close[-3] and Close[-2] > Close[-3] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1]-Open[-1] > 0.6*(High[-1]-Low[-1]) and Open[-1] >= Open[-2] and Open[-1] <= Close[-2] and Close[-1] > Close[-2]
ThreeBlackCrows: Close[-3] < Open[-3] and Close[-3]-Open[-3] < -0.6*(High[-3]-Low[-3]) and Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-2]-Open[-2] < -0.6*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Open[-2] <= Open[-3] and Open[-2] >= Close[-3] and Close[-2] < Close[-3] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Close[-1]-Open[-1] < -0.6*(High[-1]-Low[-1]) and Open[-1] <= Open[-2] and Open[-1] >= Close[-2] and Close[-1] < Close[-2]
RisingWindow: Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Low[-1] > High[-2]
FallingWindow: Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and High[-1] < Low[-2]
BullishSeparatingLines: Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and abs(Open[-1]-Open[-2]) <= 0.05*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Close[-1] > Close[-2]
BearishSeparatingLines: Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and abs(Open[-1]-Open[-2]) <= 0.05*(High[-2]-Low[-2]) and Close[-1] < Close[-2]
UpsideGapTwoCrows: Close[-3] > Open[-3] and Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-3] < Close[-2] and Close[-1] < Open[-1] and Close[-1] < Close[-2] and Open[-1] > Close[-2]
OnNeck: Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Open[-1] < Close[-2] and abs(Close[-1]-Close[-2]) <= 0.1*(High[-2]-Low[-2])
InNeck: Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Open[-1] < Close[-2] and Close[-1] > Close[-2] and Close[-1] < Open[-2]
Thrusting: Close[-2] < Open[-2] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Open[-1] < Close[-2] and Close[-1] > (Open[-2]+Close[-2])/2 and Close[-1] < Open[-2]
Deliberation: Close[-3] > Open[-3] and Close[-2] > Open[-2] and Close[-2]-Open[-2] < Close[-3]-Open[-3] and Close[-1] > Open[-1] and Close[-1]-Open[-1] < 0.5*(Close[-2]-Open[-2]) and abs(Close[-1]-Close[-2]) <= 0.1*(High[-2]-Low[-2])
